TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tamayo’an, title = Tamayo’an, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tamayo’an} }

S.FORM: tamayo'an Itiniay i Nanzhuang Cen no Miaoli ko tamayo'an a niyaro', 22 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 84 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 77 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 7 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Saysiyat76%, Tayal11%, Bunun4%, Amis1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

tamayo'an Itiniay i Nanzhoang Cen no Miaoli ko tamayo'an a niyaro', 22 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 84 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 77 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 7 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Saysiyat76%, Tayal11%, Bonon4%, Amis1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
